verses.name: Ezekiel 42:17
verses.text: He measured the north side, five hundred reeds, with the measuring reed round about.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:18
verses.text: He measured the south side, five hundred reeds, with the measuring reed.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:19
verses.text: He turned about to the west side, and measured five hundred reeds with the measuring reed.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:20
verses.text: He measured it by the four sides: it had a wall round about, five hundred reeds long, and five hundred broad, to make a separation between the sanctuary and the profane place.
